actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to require a two-thirds vote of each House of Congress (except in a state of emergency) to pass a joint resolution to continue appropriations for departments, agencies, and other entities of the Federal Government pending the passage of appropriation Acts for such departments, agencies, and other entities.

summary.text: Requires a two-thirds vote in each House of Congress to pass a joint resolution to continue appropriations for Federal departments, agencies, and other entities pending the passage of appropriation Acts for such entities. Exempts the Congress from such requirement when the President declares a state of emergency in the operation of the Federal Government.

titles.title: A bill to require a two-thirds vote of each House of Congress (except in a state of emergency) to pass a joint resolution to continue appropriations for departments, agencies, and other entities of the Federal Government pending the passage of appropriation Acts for such departments, agencies, and other entities.
